Bucket.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
Bucket.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[^:]+:s3-outposts:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:outpost\/[^:]+\/bucket\/[^:]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

PolicyDocument.description: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified bucket.
PolicyDocument.markdownDescription:
A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption
